info.name: К.Бангла
info.description:
A dark background theme for forex-bangla.com around original green colors.
Initial theme made for Bulgaria-Forex.com, blueish-green scale changed with green to suite this one.
Should work as long as vBulletin version is around 4.0.8
info.additionalInfo:
You can change any of the colors with bulk find and replace in most text editors.
Relevant colors are:
Grey backgrounds: most used #404040 #373737 #303030 less used #525252
Text: most used #cecece #f4f4f4 #ececec #ffffff less used #777 #999 #aaa #bbb #000
Green scale: #00321f #007e4f #00fe9f #7fffcf #4cffbc #32ffb2 #00b16f
